documents.title: we 'd like to thank our pizza delivery boy ¦
text: the launch of this gallery of highlights from the evening means our time is up , the night-bus has turned into a pumpkin and we 're off to bed .
thanks for being with us and see you in a fortnight , when we 'll be kicking off our oscars liveblog !
hope you got through that gallery quickly !
here 's our top 10 takeaways from this year 's awards .
contains beards .
hanging on in there for our 10 things we learned piece ?
sustain yourself with this amazing instagrams gallery .
the gang 's all here : bafta ( @ bafta ) congratulations to all of tonight 's winners !
see the full list here : # eebaftas
hawke and cruise , whose names sound terribly badass when put together , backstage : rabbit cruise ( @ mmny 1314 ) # ethanhawke and @ twitterid shared a moment behind the scenes # eebaftas
a mildly smutty tweet from elliott spencer , aka mr stephen fry , who is a fan of carell : elliott g spencer ( @ elliottgspencer ) steve carell was super funny at # eebaftas tonight !
i ca n't believe he came ð± # thatswhatshesaid
if you want to wade through a whole ton of press conferences quotes , bafta have collated them all here .
expect the phrase incredible journey to appear .
amid all the winners , congrats to the lego movie !
its energy and irreverence may have got up the nose of the us academy , but it chimed perfectly with bafta 's sense of itself as the naughty child of the film fraternity .
here 's a jubilant phil lord : philip lord ( @ philiplord ) not made of lego bricks but still pretty great @ twitterid # baftas

documents.title: afta the baftas
text: so , that 's that then .

a recap of our coverage so far : ¢ peter bradshaw 's verdict¢ full list of winners¢ news : boyhood wins big gongs but budapest takes the most¢ baftas pay tribute to stars who 've passed away¢ more on patricia arquette 's emotional speech .
still to come : ¢ 10 things we 've learned this year ( feel free to suggest some , folks !
) ¢ galleries !
best of the ceremony , and instagrams of the evening
yes , why indeed ?
kimberley majer ( @ kim marinebio ) # eebaftas why no mention of bob hoskins @ twitterid # sadtimes # legend @ twitterid67
but of course the real winners are anythingcumberbatch ( @ anythingbatch ) every single pic is gorgeous # benedictandsophie # eebaftas
forget stephen , forget claudia , forget even edith bowman .
the award for starriest mingler of the evening goes to ¦ our own ewen macaskill chatted , too , to david beckham , also at the dinner .
he mingles with actors and celebs in los angeles but it is still no more his world than mine .
it is not my industry but i am glad to be part of this , proud to be in the same room as these people , he said .
baftas 2015 : david beckham , proud to be seen with felicity jones and eddie redmayne .
furniss/corbis/splash news

bigger picture ¦ writer jennifer majka , animator and director daisy jacobs and producer chris hees , best short animation .

text: mark coulier and frances hannon , best makeup and hair , the grand budapest hotel .
m. benett/getty images it was the bellboy caps wot won it .
leigh ends his speech by inviting detractors to rot in hell .
for more such pithy signoffs , check out this guardian webchat he did in 2010 .
peter : mike leigh said he was n't going to be bad-tempered , and by his lights perhaps he was n't .
very tasty stuff in the bland cuisine of usual awards speeches , however especially in the solemn lifetime-achievement section .
happy chappy ¦ lifetime achiever mike leigh

rain/epa drumroll !

documents.title: winner : best documetary : citizenfour
text: aka the film which proves how great the guardian ( and edward snowden ) is .

documents.title: winner : best music - the grand budapest hotel
text: alexandre desplat , best original music , the grand budapest hotel .
young/rex for alexander desplat .
more from our man on the ground , ewen macaskill : chatted to imelda staunton before she sat down to dinner .
she was pleased to present mike leigh with lifetime award .

i was as bewildered as everyone else that mr turner and tim [ spall ] were not even nominated , she said , referring to the fact mr turner had made more money and been seen by bigger audiences than his earlier films .

documents.title: winner ! bafta fellowship : mike leigh
text: mike leigh , winner of the bafta fellowship .
hardcastle/rex slightly awkwardly , since he was n't found a space in the best director category for mr turner , mike leigh is given bafta 's fellowship award .
it 's a tremendous honour , he said in a press conference afterwards .
when you 've been slaving away for a million years , it 's great ¦ there are films that we made that i look at and think , how the hell did we achieve that ? '

i feel that about vera drake , i feel that about topsy turvy and mr turner.discussing the awards snub for mr turner , he said : well obviously it would have been very nice ¦ it is disappointing but we 've kind of accepted that , and in the end bafta is a democracy , and people 's tastes are their prerogative .
and there are a bunch of very good films out there .
he described whiplash as really impressive and added : my only real advice to young filmmakers is : never compromise , and push the boat out .
then you 're in with a chance .
hadley : tom cruise , fresh out of a cryogenic container that is kept in a scientology temple in beverly hills .
welcome to london , tom !
peter : i have to say very good tom cruise/ellar coltrane gag there from stephen

documents.title: winner ! best boyhood
text: birdman has its wings clipped .
present on stage are at least one of the producers snubbed by the oscars .
ellar coltrane calls the film an exercise in collaboration and vulnerability full of the simplicity of human interaction .
peter : tom locking cruise according to the bbc subtitles .
that 's the first time kate bosworth 's been mentioned at an awards ceremony in a while .
# sorrynotsorry

text: julianne moore , best actress , still alice .
c. wilson/getty images hadley : i 'm so outraged at the absence of scarlett johansson for under the skin in this category , i have no comment about anything else .
peter : hands in the pockets .
no .
no , chris evans .
no .
never a good look for a presenter
presented without comment .
ciarã¡n o'baoighill ( @ dallasgoeslive ) ca n't wait to see the theory of everything .
it looks amazing .
# eebaftas
peter : i keep thinking about stephen 's round waistcoat .
it 's sort of round .
hordle/rex
remember when peter bradshaw was absent from the liveblog for a little while earlier ?
it was n't actually because hadley had locked him in a dungeon ! ! ! ! !
it was because he travelled forward in time , checked out the results and penned this cogent critical response to all the winners and losers .
remember , if you do n't want to know the final trio of awards , do n't click here .

documents.title: winner ! best actor : eddie redmayne
text: eddie redmayne , best actor , the theory of everything , with stephen hawking .
/rex redmayne adds to his golden globe , and is now locked on to the oscar .
he alludes to his puking after some food poisoning at a previous baftas : that was one of the worst nights of my life this is one of the best nights of my life .
he thanks his family , shouts out co-star felicity jones , and with a little wobble in his voice the hawkings .
in the winners ' press conference , he said : these were roles of a lifetime ¦ it 's a weird and wondrous trade , acting , it 's full of ups and downs and you go through moments of doubt .
it 's the dream to play extraordinary people , and they rarely come as extraordinary as steven .
so i 'm so aware how lucky i was for that .

redmayne , who has also been at the heart of the elitism in the arts debate between chris bryant and james blunt , added : i think there absolutely and always has to be a debate about where actors are coming from , that diversity is represented .
our job as actors is to tell stories and everyone should be represented .
as far as the public -chool thing is concerned , i 've had a very lucky upbringing , but i 've also had a sensational teacher who is the reason i became an actor and got my first jobs .
so i suppose i tend to attribute it to a teacher rather than an entire school .
the nominees in lego , because it 's the guardian : ðð¾ñð¾ð½ð°ð²ññ ( @ meownauts ) `` ððµð³ð¾ '' ñð°ð´ñðµñññ ñð²ð¾ðµð¹ ð½ð°ð³ñð°ð´ðµ # bafta hadley : i feel sad for beetlejuice

documents.title: winner ! best director : richard linklater
text: ethan hawke , with steve carell , accepts best director on behalf of richard linklater for boyhood .
short/invision/ap the boyhood maestro takes to the stage by which we mean lookalikey ( and frequent star ) ethan hawke !
there 's no one in this room that loves cinema more than richard linklater , he claims , entirely without quantification .
peter and hadley react to the win .
peter : ethan hawke is sounding very emotional .
husky .
hadley : i 've been feeling sorry for ethan hawke for being so ignored in all the nominations for this film .
after that overly emotional speech about curing cancer i mean a movie winning an award , i do n't anymore .

documents.title: winner ! the ee rising film award : jack o'connell
text: jack o'connell gives the nadal treatment to the ee rising star award .
lipinski/pa o'connell has had a massive year , being directed by angelina jolie as the lead in unbroken , and making eye-catching leads in 71 and starred up .
i feel very honoured to be among this batch , this wave of our generation , he says after his win .
discussing his working-class background amid lots of red-hot public-school totty in the words of stephen fry o'connell said : they 're my roots .
i 'd be lying if i 'd say it does n't affect you one way or anther , particularly in this field but eddie ( redmayne ) put himself where he is , as did benedict ( cumberbatch ) .
that said , so did i .
and , yes , we do represent different social classes , but i do n't think that should be important .

documents.title: in memoriam â bafta remembers those who 've died this year
text: save for richard attenborough , who had his own spot .
and bob hoskins , whom they seem to have forgotten .
full story here .
hadley : people who make us cheer and laugh can never die , says fry before the inevitable montage of death .
except , of course , they have .
peter : uh-oh .
in memoriam .
will stephen follow it with his i did not think death had undone so many line ?
update : no !
stephen did n't do a solemn outro to the death montage .
hadley : i am genuinely amazed sienna miller has n't been nominated for anything for american sniper .
ffs she dyes her hair brown in that film !
that 's surely worth a globe , at least !

documents.title: winner ! best adapted screenplay : the theory of everything
text: anthony mccarten , best adapted screenplay , the theory of everything .
rain/epa one scientist biopic swipes it from another .
anthony mccarten credits both stephen hawking , and also jane hawking 's extraordinarily unflinching book about living with her husband .
peter : noomi and jesse are the closest to muppets in the presenting rota .
and i mean that as a compliment .
breaking : peter reacts to the original screenplay win for grand budapest .

documents.title: winner ! foreign language film : ida
text: the ida team , with pawel pawlikowski second from right , best foreign-language film .
short/invision/ap pawel pawlikowski and team come up , having snatched this from fave leviathan .

pawlikowski , who previously won baftas for last resort and my summer of love in two other categories , drolly says : i think we should just forget the formalities and award me a global lifetime achievement award .
peter : a classically oscar-ish robotic intro from john boyega and alice eve there ida !
a great film although my vote went for leviathan
alice eve !
handy with a selfie .
sounds like the queen at 3pm on christmas day , however .

twitter still all about this : oswin ( @ gawones ) questo ã amore # benedictcumberbatch # eebaftas ivory coast just won 9-8 on pens in the african cup of nations , in case you 're in the wrong place .

documents.title: winner ! original screenplay : the grand budapest hotel
text: ralph fiennes , collecting wes anderson 's award for best original screenplay for the grand budapest hotel , poses with presenter julianne moore .
short/invision/ap ralph fiennes skips to the stage .

documents.title: prince william pays tribute to dickie attenborough
text: by video .
likewise robert downey jr , talking up his ceaseless passion and singular , extraordinary wit .
dickie 's that is , not will 's .
peter : what is the car behind robert downey jr ?
his smile-though-your-heart-is-breaking routine is a nightmare and zomg .
prince william 's ponderous taped statement looks and sounds like a party political broadcast from 1978 and i have to say stephen 's serious tributes always sound a bit burbling however well meant .
and why have n't they included seance on a wet afternoon in the montage ?
hadley : boy , nothing gets an award ceremony going like a member of the royal family .
prince william should be studied by geneticists .
as a child , he looked like his mother .
now , he has morphed completely into his father .
fascinating .
incidentally , i like how robert downey jr pointedly refers to attenborough as richard , whereas stephen fry , inevitably , wheels out the dickie .
this confirms my strong sus that only people who never met him refer to him as dickie .
more swoons .
bafta is really running with the whole kissing meme : jimmy fallon ( @ thedeductiongod ) kisses from chris evans and henry cavill # eebaftas
reminder : all this is actually ancient history .
for what happened in full , click here for the full , spoiler-filled list of winners .
dick pope did n't win tonight , but the mispronunciation of his name at the oscar noms makes him the viral winner : dan carter ( @ thatdandyboy ) sad that dick poop got no mention tonight .
# eebaftas lee west ( @ leewest82 ) dick poop !
# eebaftas david cummins ( @ david21cummins ) the # dickpoop reference was lost on my mum : ( # eebaftas

documents.title: winner ! outstanding debut by a british writer , director or producer : pride
text: pride writer stephen beresford and producer david livingstone accept the award for outstanding british debut .
kendal/barcroft media writer stephen beresford and producer david livingstone take to the stage .
you can read all our pride content here , including a piece by director matthew warchus on why he made the movie .
peter : outstanding debut always the most interesting part of the evening .
a chance for a cinderella moment for an indie british film-maker .
this year the underdog is probably lilting a much-loved film .
as for the winner : great stuff great film
peter : is it me , or is keira knightley looking increasingly soignã©e ?

documents.title: winner ! cinematography : birdman
text: michael keaton up the award for best cinematography on behalf of emmanuel lubezki for birdman plunkett/reuters emmanuel lubezki is back , having up the same award last year for gravity .
except he 's not here , and michael keaton is it up instead .
hadley : stephen fry 's ecstatic little oh !
after referring to cinematography .
i mean , come on , britain .
this is your national treasure .
peter : stephen has gone into qi mode for introducing the cinematography award .
a bit .
and the dart-stitching on gugu 's dress is a bit startling .
possibly unfortunate .
ahem
stephen fry nicks amy'n'tina 's joke from last year about black people 's names being hard to pronounce .
nice !
yeah , probably best bit of the evening so far tbh : lynn li ( @ fromwestvillage ) reminded me how good richard ashcroft sounds # eebaftas
hadley : alabama whitman - for the bafta !
clarence will be so proud of his honey bee .
peter : rene russo was sort of brilliant in nightcrawler - i loved that gamey sexual tang with jake gyllenhaal .

documents.title: winner ! supporting actress : patricia arquette , boyhood
text: patricia arquette , best supporting actress .
lipinski/pa no shocks as easy favourite arquette takes to the stage .
later tonight , she will give an emotional speech in the press room , and we will write a news story about it .
here 's an extract from it : she also attributed the lack of roles for older women to the fact that men do n't want to be cast with women who are their real age .
i find it funny sometimes you 'll have someone like harrison ford in a movie and the woman opposite him is n't a few years younger than him , she 'll be 20 years younger .
and that 's the ridiculous thing .
we need to call bullshit on that .
i 'm really loving getting older .
there was so much pressure and weirdness and tension on the sexual element when i was younger , i feel so liberated now and i 'm loving it .
hadley : it is , of course , cuba gooding jr , shouts stephen fry .
there is no of course in that sentence , steve .
peter : cuba gooding jr doing a this-is-mine-and-patricia's-private-joke laugh
that 's the first time i 've ever kissed a member of the royal family !
your lips are so soft cuba gooding jr also cosies up to fry .
he 's in the ( snubbed ? )
selma fyi .

documents.title: winner ! outstanding british contribution to cinema : bbc films
text: aka also the broadcaster of the ceremony .
wondering who christine langan , the woman up on stage , is ?
we 're here for you .
peter : a great moment i reckon .
christine langan is a very good thing the guardian ( @ guardian ) baftas 2015 : who is christine langan ?
hadley : love julie walters 's skittish little back-kick on now !
peter : i 'm loving this montage
i wish i could have had you as my lobby boy , says ralph fiennes of stephen fry .
oh , luvvies .

documents.title: winner ! best supporting actor : jk simmons , whiplash
text: jk simmons , best supporting actor fisher/rex the man takes to the stage , continuing his awards season tear after a golden globe win in the same category .
possibly the surest oscar win of the lot ?
says he loves his children infinity .
awww !

from the winner 's press conference , he says : damien [ chazelle , director ] is obviously a force to be reckoned with ¦ having worked with masterful directors like jason reitman , sam raimi and the coen brothers i would put damien , without hesitation , in that category .
he also said he thought his co-star miles teller was not getting the recognition he deserved .
in my view he is not getting his due in this awards season , but maybe we can chalk that up to youth and the perception that he has n't paid his dues yet .
hadley : to be honest , i 'd have been happy with anyone in this category winning .
but i do love that mr juno won it and not for juno , either !
bonus !
peter : death .
taxes .
and jk simmons winning best supporting actor for whiplash .
as alan partridge might have put it : he is the best jk since rowling .
i think jk has done the above average children gag before but it 's still gold .
hadley : poor steve carell , though .
you can almost hear his inner monologue , dammit , you all gave awards to nicole kidman for wearing a fake nose in the hours !
what about me ?
what about me ? ! ? ! ? ! ? ! ? ! ? !
peter : i was imprisoned in hadley 's private dungeon , but like joaquin phoenix in inherent vice i have escaped .
further proof that natalie dormer 's pout is the true winner of the rising star award :

documents.title: winner ! best visual effects : interstellar
text: ian hunter , scott fisher , adrew lockley and paul franklin , best special effects for interstellar .
plunkett/reuters tech geniuses paul franklin , scott fisher , andrew lockley stride up .
they laud their fearless leader christopher nolan .
peter : there 's always a weird pause when loads of people in black tie have to climb up on stage .
eric fellner always sounds very authoritative .
in another life , he could have been a sonorous prime minister .

documents.title: stephen hawking is presenting an award !
text: quite a coup !
felicity jones says i 'm particularly pleased to be presenting this award alongside the only person in the world more intelligent than stephen fry .
yes , and better looking , says hawking .
zing !
hadley : stephen hawking presenting an award !
this is the biggest honour ever bestowed on the man .
i 'm just a little worried that he wo n't be able to follow in the mighty footsteps of the previous presenter , david beckham .
peter : felicity looks overwhelmed to be doing a double-act with professor hawking .
which is fair enough
those who want to know the news when it happens , rather than when the bbc broadcasts it , can see the full list of winners here ( it 's actually now almost ended ) .

documents.title: winner ! outstanding british film : the theory of everything
text: cast and crew of the theory of everything pose with the award for outstanding british film j hogan/getty images and here 's the producers : james marsh , tim bevan , eric fellner , lisa bruce , anthony mccarten hadley : what is it with film awards and films featuring british actors playing real-life people with a disability ?
my left foot , the king 's speech , the imitation game ( in which turing is portrayed as having some sort of asperger 's ) , the theory of everything , and on and on it goes .
anyway , this is not our business here right now .
my business is that under the skin should have won this , but to do that they 'd have needed to have ralph fiennes making a cameo as someone with tourette 's syndrome .
one of stephen fry 's best bits was alluding to hollywood actors still not being able to come out in 60 years ' time showing off bafta 's countercultural awards season self-presentation .
peter : benedict does n't look especially chuffed at stephen 's totty gag .
he 's focused .
hadley : oh look , it 's the rarely spotted stephenius fryantollus , compering for the evening .
truly , he is like britain 's very own thomas pynchon is n't he , such a recluse .
i 'd really forgotten what he looks like , it 's been so long since he did his chortle-chortle-i'm-the-nation's-adorable-uncle-did-i-mention-oscar-wilde-how-about-apple-chortle-chortle routine .
i appreciate that this will probably lead to my deportation from this country , but i do not really understand the mass popularity of stephen fry .
peter : stephen rather took his time getting to the pissing down with stars punchline .

kasabian start the show with a song about how screen-based entertainment rots your brain : cos you 've been watching too much tvit 's playing with your memoryit 's tryinna break your heart just calm down , take your medicationit numbs you to the worldnot my world do n't bring us down guys !
films are great !
incidentally , this means they 're not at the grammys , which are also tonight and which the guardian will also be heavily covering .
hadley : cuba gooding jr in mirrored aviators , head bopping to the baftas .
doing british culture proud here , people .
benjamin lee ( @ benfraserlee ) kasabian droning on while a poorly assembled montage of random film clips plays before a bemused cuba gooding jr # brokenbritain
black tie , white noise ¦ kasabian .
hordle/rex hadley : you know , i 've managed to get through 36 years without once seeing a kasabian live performance .
damn you , baftas ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
hadley : it 's been an incredible year for british film i just stood next to the batman !
gurns kasabian 's serge pizzorno , apparently unaware that neither birdman nor michael keaton are british .
nor , for that matter , that anyone cares what he thinks .

documents.title: tv broadcast starts
text: it 's on !
it 's so on !
( bbc1 , right now ) ( if you want to catch up with the key red carpet looks , by the way , have a gander of this )
hadley : what i love about you is that you work on such amazingly diverse projects , edith says to steve carell , having apparently never seen anchorman and 40-year-old virgin and anchorman 2
check out some of the centrepieces in the bafta tables .

congrats to the person who went full-bore blue peter tracy island on this stuff : grosvenor house jw ( @ grosvenor house ) a selection of the fabulous @ twitterid center pieces # eebaftas can you guess which films they represent ?
hadley : public service announcement : edith bowman just used the phrase amazing journey .
that 's worth at least three shots in the movie awards bingo drinking game .

hadley 's dungeon : live feed hadley : by the way , if any of you are wondering why i am now flying solo , minus my co-bantzer peter bradshaw , i can now exclusively reveal the reason : it 's because i 've locked him in my dungeon .
that 's what i do to colleagues who i feel are overshadowing me ( say hi to marina hyde down there , peter ) .
i might let him out a bit later , but only if he promises to give me all the jokes .
hadley : can someone please tell edith bowman to stop asking nominees what the first film was that they saw in the cinema ?
no one gives a flying hoot .
ta !
hannahjane parkinson ( @ ladyhaja ) the security guy taking a selfie with julianne moore at the # eebaftas is my spirit animal cc @ twitterid
hadley : how does reese witherspoon feel about being nominated for a bafta ?
it 's such an honour , and it 's so beautiful she says vaguely .
sweetly , reese then decides to double down on this : it 's beautiful , it really is such a beautiful , beautiful award !
bless you , reese and keep on enjoying the free champagne .
hadley : margot robbie worked in several tv shows drones the bafta narration .
um , hello , bafta people , it was not just some random tv shows , it was home and away .
it 's almost like the baftas are embarrassed that one of their nominees comes from summer bay .
as if !
hadley : the sight of edith bowman trying to interview a distinctly unenthusiastic ed norton and ralph fiennes is more tragic than anything in any of the bafta-nominated films tonight .
hordle/rex hadley : stephen hawking is also there on the red carpet .
strangely , i do n't seem to have received any press releases about what he 's wearing .
by contrast , i have received literally 7,150 press releases about felicity jones , who plays his wife in the film .
this definitively proves that felicity jones is more accomplished than stephen hawking .
step it up , stevie boy !
competing with alejandro gonzã¡lez iã±ã¡rritu for boldness in directing this year is this person getting all constructivist with henry cavill : visionary .
hadley : oh look , it 's david beckham at the baftas , here to present the best british film award .
which totally makes sense , right ?
i mean , he is a great british film-maker and all .
david lean , david beckham , there 's basically no difference .
anyone would think bafta 's been ignoring him ¦ mike leigh .
lipinski/pa an eagle-eyed production editor reports some amazingly glum snaps of mike leigh are coming through on the wires .

hadley ( who 's watching the pre-show on bbc3 ) : let 's hopefully get some revealing words from the celebs , says an optimistic edith bowman.it 's weird but very wonderful , eddie redmayne reveals about being nominated , revealingly .
truly , red carpet journalism makes the watergate exposã© look like mere hackery .
here 's our interview with eddie from the red carpet !
anyone wanting to avoid spoilers , swerve the birmingham mail .
natasha jones ( @ tasha ivanova ) ffs .
trying to stay away from bafta spoilers and then i get spoiled by the bham mail .
even the bafta twitter account is being spoiler free !
unlike our villainous brummie peers , we 're updating this to align with the beeb 's coverage .
so we 're kind of pretending like it 's not started yet , even though it actually has .
got that ?
good .
chris o'dowd ( @ bigboyler ) i was once nominated for a bafta rising star award .
unfortunately , my fellow nominees have had some pretty lean years since .
this is funny because they 've all been really famous since .
this year 's nominees in the category are gugu mbatha-raw , jack o'connell , margot robbie , shailene woodley and miles teller .
peter : ok , back to leonard rossiter .
catherine has just made the excellent point that comparing fiennes to rossiter is not an insult .
he made two great tv shows , and he was also a seminal arturo ui in the brecht play .
and in at least two kubrick films .
hadley : mm .
you do know i moved to england in the 90s ? peter : oh .
shall i tell you what was an awards-show piece of overdone nonsense ? hadley : what ?
peter : argo.hadley : argo.peter : argo.hadley : argo ? peter : argo .
adoration of male celebrities on twitter is now ascending into avant-garde minimalist poetry : ele .
( @ namelessteele ) hulk look rare , amazing mark # eebaftas
want to see what 's in the goody bags for all the bafta nominees ?
excuse us while we promote instyle here and gaze upon its cave of wonders : instyle ( @ instyle uk ) how would you like to win the official @ twitterid nominee gift bag ?
rt & follow to enter # bafta folio society tokens and bendy slippers ?
just try and step to the old country , oscars !
stuart heritage ( @ stuheritage ) here 's @ twitterid1 and @ twitterid 's bafta liveblog .
i really hope they liveblog the oscars too ! ! ! !
( the joke here is that stuart is joining hadley and peter to liveblog the oscars . )

best completely shameless hijacking of an awards ceremony kevin hart is n't even nominated in goes to sony pictures : sony pictures uk ( @ sonypicturesuk ) if there was a @ twitterid for best , best man @ twitterid4real would totally win !
# weddingringer # bestbestman
peter : how do we feel about ralph fiennes ?
hadley : oooh , i have a lot to say about ralph fiennes .
peter : i will tell you what i have to say about ralph fiennes .
i resent people saying he looks like leonard rossiter because they think it takes him down a peg or two .
i hate that .
he does n't look like leonard rossiter .
hadley : i 'm so pleased to see him moving away from being tedious mopey british thesp to larky fun comedic british guy .
less shakespeare , more shits'n'giggles.peter : totally .
he was very larky on the red carpet earlier .
he brought the larks , or should i say larkz.hadley : he also carries grand budapest and makes it less twee which is what it would have been if it had starred jason schwartzman .
peter : apropos of nothing , what do we think of ryan reynolds ? hadley : van wilder party liaison .
classic movie .
peter : i liked the nines with melissa mccarthy.hadley : i think this is part of bradley cooper 's pact with the devil .
he sacrificed reynolds 's career in order for his own to succeed .
lots of this kind of stuff doing the rounds .
get a room , the internet and benedict cumberbatch !
lena umã©renkova ( @ yeah lena ) they are definition of love ð # sophiehunter # benedictcumberbatch // @ twitterid # eebaftas watson .
( @ sorenza17 ) the way they look at each other is just the perfect thing ever .
ð # benedictcumberbatch # sophiehunter # eebaftas

documents.title: ewen macaskill gets the skinny direct from jk simmons
text: met jk simmons on way to the toilets at bafta awards .
i told him i had seen whiplash last week and , as a jazz fan , thought it was great .
i asked simmons if he liked jazz .
i was not interested before , he said .
but i am more appreciative now .

icymi last night at some pre-bafta shindig , these two got back together to show each other the money : lourdes adã¡n ( @ adn lulu ) @ premiososcar : reencuentro de los protagonistas de 'jerry maguire ' en la fiesta de anoche # showmethemoney # eebaftas
hordle/rex hadley 's wishlist is rather briefer : for stephen fry to experience an epiphanical moment in which he realises he never wants to host another awards show again .

peter 's wishlist for the evening : i 'd like to see them play the death march over the montage of people who have died this year or better yet , do a montage of people whose careers have died this year , to the accompaniment of ethel merman singing there 's no business like showbusiness

documents.title: hadley 's hot
text: best boyhood ( but nightcrawler should have been nominated , too ) director : richard linklater , boyhood ( but jonathan glazer for under the skin should really have been nominated ) actor : ralph fiennes , the grand budapest hotel ( i know he wo n't , but i love him in this .
david oyelowo should have been in the running too .
and miles teller ) actress : i have n't seen still alice , so ca n't comment on julianne moore 's worthiness here .
but really , i think it should have gone to scarlett johansson for under the skin
more from the roving hannah e-p : the three co-directors and writers of the lego movie have been busy writing the script for the follow up in their hotel room .
their main plan for the evening is to ambush famous people and get them into our film benedict cumberbatch would be great .

documents.title: peter 's
text: this is what peter thinks should win tonight : picture : boyhooddirector : richard linklateractor : jake gyllenhaalactress : felicity jones

it 's not yet eight , but the leviathan tributing has already begun ¦ casparllewellynsmith ( @ casparls ) that @ twitterid only gave @ twitterid and @ twitterid1 the idea : already vodka time for the @ twitterid show !
dukeofstratosphere 08 february 2015 5:39pm france make much better films than the british and has far more talented actors and actresses , without the need for such irrelevant awards .
baftas - an embarrassing spectacle of conceited narcissism .
an embarrassing spectacle of conceited narcissism : the evin twin of a heartbreaking work of staggering genius .

documents.title: benedict cumberbatch : `` i wish david oyelowo was here tonight ''
text: cumberbatch is also championing david oyelowo , whose portrayal of martin luther king was n't recognised by his home nation 's academy apparently because no one got to see it in time .
he says : i wish david oyelowo was here tonight .
i do n't understand it .
he would have got my vote .

selma 's director , ava duvernay , was very gracious about not being nommed for many awards when we chatted to her recently but argued that all minorities need more stories being recognised at events like this .
peter : so , hadley .
who do we fancy hadley : chiwetel ejiofor .
peter : for best film ?
which is the most overrated piece of middlebrow nonsense ?
hadley : american sniper .
no question .

when did bradley cooper make this deal with the devil that he keeps getting nominated for these average films , like silver linings playbook and american sniper ? peter : there was nothing for hangover 3.hadley : i 'd prefer that to have been nominated .
so what is your most overrated piece of middlebrow crap ?
peter : it 's not crap but i 'm not keen on wild .
in fact i 'm quite close to doing a joke about that title .
something like hadley : so you 're not finger quotes wild about wildpeter : i was going to say tame .
did you see what i did there ?
our loyal commenters are going in on the fashion choices .
lambtonworm 08 february 2015 6:48pm olivia grant looks like she has had a stroke , and natalie dorman appear to be sucking a lemon .
kristin scott-thomas looks wonderful , as always .
hermionegingold 08 february 2015 6:47pm i adore julianne but put your baps back in the bread bin dear .
less is moore .
x tough crowd .
our colleague hannah ellis-petersen has been stalking schlebs on the red carpet .
amongst the morsels she gleaned : serge from kasabian , who are opening the show , has his fingers crossed that jack o'connell will win rising star .
he 's amazing so i 'm willing to overlook the fact he 's a derby fan , ' he said .
you may remember that serge has already thoroughly stuck it to the man with this t-shirt : thinks : you could swap the other kasabianer here with tim minchin and no-one would notice .

the save soho campaign , devoted to making wc2 the den of iniquity it has traditionally been , rather than a dystopia of zizzis and generic luxury apartments , got another big supporter in the form of fellow twitter-enchanter benedict cumberbatch : the skymeteor ( @ skymeteorcom ) tim arnold snaps cheeky pre-bafta selfie with benedict cumberbatch for # savesoho -
the guardian 's ewen macaskill , star of citizenfour and a first-time bafta attendee , is in the house .
here 's his first bulletin : i was directed to champagne party but it was mainly for people working in industry other than actors .
went down backstairs and found party for actors .
elbowed into conversation with james mcavoy in hope that as fellow-scot he would be friendly and he was .
his prediction .
eddie redmayne is favourite .
he deserves to win but it is going to be tight .

mcavoy surprised by omission of selma given british involvement , it is an incredible omission because in so many ways it is a british film mcavoy , appearing in ruling class , has frankenstein out in october , another x-men on the way and maybe another play .
oh ruffalo , stop it with your adorable dental hygiene you beast .
praise already for hadley + peter combo : mary dobson ( @ medobson ) @ catherineshoard @ twitterid1 @ twitterid greatest guardian duo ever .

paddy considine was quietly spellbinding in pawel pawlikowski 's debut last resort and also his my summer of love , and bigs up the polish director of ida on twitter : paddy considine ( @ paddyconsidine ) big love to all the @ twitterid nominees at tonight 's bafta 's .
also to my mentor pawel pawlikowski for the beautiful 'ida ' .
peter : lã©a seydoux 's appearance on # eebaftas red carpet has taken my obsession with her to new , thermonuclear levels .
she is there with her arm around monica bellucci who looks like she 's playing mary magdalene in a biblical e but lã©a is fantastic .
that heavy-lidded look of sullen-plus-sultry contempt is fantastic .
hadley : i prefer the other one .
you know .
the other one.peter : what ? hadley : the non-blue one .
peter : adã¨le exarchopoulos ?
hadley : yeah , whatever .
that one .
kasasbian are opening .
i think we should go now , peter.peter : is that a pop combo ?
hadley : that 's putting it kindly.peter : noel gallagher 's here actually .
hadley : what is this , the q awards ?
peter : do you realise that i have been invited to the universal party tonight ?
mm-hmm .
you know it.hadley : funnily enough , i have n't been invited to the harvey weinstein party.peter : no .
i imagine not .
the arrival of tom hiddleston on any kind of carpet , be it red , shagpile or some offcuts discarded outside of carpetright , sets twitter ablaze with lust .
much of the # eebafta hashtag is dominated by this lot : hiddlestruck ( @ hishiddleness ) `` this year it was pretty much about tom hiddleston . ''
well , is n't that every year ? !
wonder what will happen when he is nominated !

# eebaftas priyaã ( @ priyaashahh ) he 's doing the lip thing # benedictcumberbatch # eebaftas hiddles tigress ( @ hiddlestigress ) awwww ¦ a group of fans just sang happy birthday to # tomhiddleston on the # eebaftas red carpet !
british film 's noel clarke is making the most of his biggest night of the year , going in on the socials with jack o'connell : noel clarke ( @ noelclarke ) on the carpet with some peeps .
# eebaftas
just a reminder that the baftas actually started about 15 minutes ago .
but unless anyone keels over , we 're going to carry on like they have n't and perpetuate the fiction imposed by bbc1 that they actually happen at 9pm .
if you do want to know the winners , you can see the rolling list here .

documents.title: and the baton is passed !
text: the fashion team have retired and the film squad are now on keyboards .
lead vocals : peter bradshaw and hadley freeman .
backing singers : catherine shoard , ben beaumont-thomas , andrew pulver and many more .
catherine shoard ( @ catherineshoard ) baftas liveblog is live and fizzing !
with @ twitterid1 and @ twitterid

documents.title: fashion team signing off
text: ok , so that 's enough bitching from us .
snap verdict : lã©a seydoux , julianne moore , keira knightley and douglas booth looked brilliant .
everyone else was a disgrace .
seventies cleavage is everywhere and so is sideboob .
you have been warned .
douglas booth .
m. benett/getty fresh from the menswear shows it 's loin-rouser douglas booth , who has arrived in a wacky pea-green and black-velvet combo topped with the requisite fash-beard .
swoon , etc .
anne-marie duff .
lipinski/pa goodness .
anne marie duff 's 'do is exhausting , employing little-girl ringlets and trustafarian dreadlocks , while also using her own hair as a hairband .
gugu mbatha-raw .
fisher/rex we 're thoroughly unconvinced by the silhouette of belle star gugu mbatha-raw 's dress , which , from afar , looks a little like a lilac pestle .
any thoughts as to what she 's carrying in her pockets , feel free to pop in the comments block below !
julie walters .
fisher/rex the dress says : pizzazz !
the underwhelmed expression is wonderfully at odds with that message and suggests she would much rather be watching call the midwife .
felicity jones .

hordle/rex the hotly tipped best actress felicity jones ( the theory of everything ) has come in a weighty dior dress with floral sheer skirt and a blocky dark top , replete with braid and smokey eye .
can we say it 's a slightly odd cut on her petite frame ?
ok , well , we just did .
lã©a seydoux and monica bellucci .
fisher/rex these are your bond girls , then .
monica bellucci takes the modesty trend to its logical conclusion by covering every inch of flesh including her hands in huge bell sleeves .
lã©a seydoux 's canary confection may well be the frock of the night , though .
love the classy flesh flashing ( a few inches of ribcage , not a hint of sideboob ) and the bright red lipstick .
the colour combo recalls michelle williams at the 2006 oscars , the gold standard by which all yellow-red carpet dresses are measured .
david beckham .
young/rex david beckham has arrived !
we have no idea why .
that 's all .
natalie dormer .
fisher/rex what is it with gloves on the red carpet this season ?
first amal clooney 's baggy marigolds at the golden globes , now natalie dormer does miss havisham .
the only thing gloves are good for , really , is hiding fake tan stains please , dudes , stop trying to make them happen .
on the up side , by unleashing another odd , goth-inspired outfit tonight , dormer is giving us all something to write about in the absence of helena bonham carter .
yay !
julianne moore .
young/rex straying from this year 's apparent wallflower dress code is julianne moore , for still alice , and apparently boogie nights , too .
before you judge , this is a bold , bold take on this season 's 1970s boob , here slashed navel-deep and topped with a collar .
bonus points for the double texture velvet top .
kristin scott thomas .
fisher/rex the reliably slick kristin scott thomas is getting a bit of flak on social media for dressing like she 's at a funeral .
for shame !
she 's looking demure and wintry and has chosen to let her giant probably-real diamond earrings and tomboy-flick do the work .
hero .
it 's the double teapot !
reese witherspoon .
young/rex oh , reese .
yes , your stella mccartney frock is lovely , but the guardian 's fashion editor has already warned you about those beauty-pageant poses .
still , great night for stella tonight .
amy adams fisher/rex one of hollywood 's big guns , amy adams , has arrived for big eyes .
she 's gone for ghd straightened hair and this unusual number by stella mccartney , accessorised by a diamante and various bits of white tassled rope .
it 's a bit of a dead weight , but we say that with kindness her previous successes via dior and oscar de la renta have been simply mwah .
keira knightley .
fisher/rex so far , keira knightley has been going great guns with the maternity wear on the red-carpet thing , and it continues tonight in monochrome chanel .
she 's lucky she has n't got swollen ankles .
rosamund pike .
fisher/rex having taken vera wang off her christmas card list after the golden globes , rosamund pike looks utterly lovely in black roland mouret .
no worst-dressed lists for this one tonight .
kasabian .
m. benett/getty images as predicted ( that 's a complete lie ) , it 's kasabian .
they 're here because they 're opening the ceremony .
how basic is that ?
two out of four at them look decent and on-code , but as to what sergio pizzorno is up to with his literal take on black tie , frankly we 're ashamed .
mica levi aka micachu .
m benett/getty images and here 's micachu aka mica levi , the terrifyingly gifted musician who did the fingernails-down-blackboard score for under the skin , our film of 2014 .
quite into the long black patent jacket and underground creepers because , well , at least somewhere has acknowledged the fact that it 's february .
olivia grant .
young/rex bit moulin rouge meets nightie , this but lovely to see a redhead in pale pink .
also brilliant to see jenny packham on the red carpet .
not only because packham is a british designer , but also because she is chris packham 's sister .
wonders never cease
stephen hawking .
marsland/wireimage it would be weird if stephen hawking , inspiration behind the theory of everything , was n't here , seeing as the film is nominated for pretty much every award going .
note the pharrell-williams-at-davos-style silk scarf , a big look in menswear aw15 .
holliday grainger .
toby/wenn holliday grainger on the art of standing on a red carpet : cross your legs like you need a wee and do the teapot arm .
forties curls and monochrome are a pretty safe bet if you tend to appear in period films , which grainger does ; it 's a pretty combo .
added props for trialling this season 's 1970s cleavage ; retracted props for wearing this season 's boob pointer necklace .
shudder .

documents.title: does anyone know why noel gallagher is here ?
text: noel gallagher and wife sara macdonald .
crossick/pa in any case , we appreciate a man in an olive green suit jacket .
that weird couple therapy posing is less good .
claudia winkleman .
fisher/rex it 's kate bush !
oh no it 's not , it 's claudia winkleman !
she 's playing it safe in what looks like black taffeta and shoes made from actual ribbon .
who knew that was even possible ?
that said , she has trimmed her fringe .
hayley atwell .
fisher/rex swit swoo , hayley atwell .
it 's navy .
it 's clingy .
it 's at once body-covering and extremely revealing , thanks to all those see-through panels .
it 's very likely to be stella mccartney , who does a nice line in polka-dot mesh and nice to see an early nod to a british designer if so .

if we 're being harsh , pencil skirts often feel a bit more office christmas party than red carpet , and there is something slightly off-duty burlesque dancer about the peekaboo gauze , but why wear a princess frock if it 's not your thing ?
redmaynia alert hannah bagshawe and eddie redmayne .
young/rex it 's eddie redmayne in once again blue velvet .
it 's not dissimilar to the gucci suit he wore to the golden globes except this one , fact finders , is by armani .
he 's arrived with his wife , hannah bagshawe , who 's in something dainty and modest and possibly valentino .
romola garai .
tallis/afp/getty images according to my gran , the key to dressing well is always wearing three colours no more , no less .
if all of those colours are this cute and bright , it starts to look like a fight in a sherbert factory .
also , those cuffs ?
nah .
jk simmons .
young/rex always the bridesmaid and never the best actor , it 's jk simmons !
he 's totally jumped the shark by wearing black tie !
simmons is here for whiplash , a brilliant film that will make you love or hate jazz depending on whether you loved or hated jazz to start with .
first trend alert : like jack o'connell , he 's also doing the one-button dinner jacket thing .
spare a thought for us , the fashion team , monitoring the red carpet during the fallow period before most actual celebrities can be bothered to turn up .
this is the sort of outfit we are faced with appraising , and it belongs to hofit golan , a socialite according to google .
while we applaud her panache , that is definitely bad fake tan and too much underboob .
hofit golan .
fisher/rex
jack o'connell .
young/rex and here 's jack o'connell looking dapper as you 'd expect a possible winner to look ( he 's up for the rising star award ) .
the facial hair is a bit ethan hawke circa reality bites , but we 're quite into the one-button dinner jacket .
louche .
edith bowman .
toby/wenn so we 're guardian fashion and we 're here for the duration of the red-carpet preamble .
here 's edith bowman in what appears to be brocade .
we say brocade , but we ca n't actually tell from where we are : there 's a lot going on .
it 's quite wolf hall , though ?
either way , she must be freezing .

documents.title: baftas bingo ! what to expect this year
text: looking ahead to the movie awards , last night 's victory at the directors guild america for birdman over boyhood has added a certain frisson to the evening .
might richard linklater really not go all the way ?
tonight will help us tell .

here 's our predictions for this evening 's awards , as well as a gallery of the stars gadding about in london last night , analysis of whether the baftas are more than just an oscars bellwether , whether this year 's contenders spell the end of creative bravery , plus six things to look out for this year .

documents.title: baftas begin !
text: hello and welcome to the guardian 's epic rolling report of this year 's british academy film awards .

we 'll be with you until midnight , with hannah marriott and morwenna ferrier covering the red carpet action from now until around 7pm gmt , when they hand over to the film team , including hadley freeman and peter bradshaw , who 'll cover build-up and then the ceremony itself , which is broadcast on bbc1 from 9pm .

bulletin.text: Peter Bradshaw, Hadley Freeman and a starry cast of close to hundreds brought you live coverage of the 68th British Film Academy awards, including all the shocks and frocks from the red carpet. Relive the night again and again!
